mentionedBy.name: Blackbaud Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Top alternative for both Enterprise CRM and Raiser's Edge. Cloud-based donor management with CRM, online donations, email marketing, and reporting. Pricing starts at $125/month for 1000 contacts.
